muse::Event

Detailed Description

The base class for all events in a simulation.

This class represents the base class from which all user-defined simulation events must be derived.

To create an event for your simulation, make sure you derive from this Event Class, Also you will NOT override any of the given methods, instead add your own methods and whatever the agent receiving the event needs to process the event.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

muse::Event::Event ( AgentID &  id,
Time &  time 
) [explicit]

The ctor method.

This is the fastest way to create an Event object. The AgentID of the agent receiving the event and the delivery time is the least amount of information needed to be a vaild Event.

Parameters:
id this is of type AgentID and its a reference
deliveryTime this is of type Time which is also a reference.
